results.content:
The density of information in this course is extremely low. Most of the time you watch the instructor typing in HTML templates - and doing so extremely slowly and exhibiting a lot of mistakes and bad style. He doesn't explain why he does the things he does, what are the advantages of using one style vs. the other or how things work - he only narrates what he does ("I will now add a modifier to that function.")

The original price of € 199,- is just outrageous for the amount of information, that frankly would have fit in a medium length blog post. But even the 12,99 I paid for it I consider overprized.
